query.where: process_name = '{$temp.tmp_processname_ack}' and confirmation_id='{$temp.tmp_Current_OpportunityID/text()}' Order By created_date desc limit 1
process_name = '{$temp.tmp_processname_ack}' and confirmation_id = '{$temp.tmp_Current_OpportunityID/text()}' Order By created_date desc limit 1

end.title: End - No Items exists in SC

assignment.title: Update SAP IDs back to VForce Oppty
Update SAP IDs back to VForce Oppty in Upsell Scenario

operation.expression:
<s4c:ServiceContractRequest xmlns:s4c="http://sap.com/xi/S4CRM/">
{let $xml := $temp.tmp_ServiceContractRequest_Payload
return 
  for $ele in $xml/*
  return if($ele/name() = 'ServiceContract')
        then
        (
       <ServiceContract actionCode="{$temp.tmp_SC_Request_ActionCode/text()}">{$ele/element()} </ServiceContract>          
        )
        else (
        $ele
        )}
        </s4c:ServiceContractRequest>

throwInput.parameter: SC Create/Update step failed for Opportunity {$input.OpportunityID/text()}

assignment.title: Derive Warning Fields
assignment.operation: Status Unknown : Did not receive Acknowledgement from SAP for Opportunity {$temp.tmp_Current_OpportunityID/text()}
